Spiral Stack Rush is a challenging color-growing game. In this game, you need to increase the volume of fabric by rolling layers of colorful fabric. Each time you roll your layers, you need to choose the right fabric color to maintain the continuity of the roll. Choosing the wrong color will cause the player to lose a layer of fabric and make reaching the end of the level more difficult.
The goal of the game is to get as high a score as possible while increasing the volume of fabric. The more layers of fabric you roll and stack, the higher your score.

desc: Merge Number is a challenging and exciting puzzle game. In this game, you will face a series of number squares and combine them through simple addition and subtraction operations. When the number of adjacent blocks with the same number exceeds 3, they will be merged into a new block, and the number in it will automatically increase by one. At the same time, you will also get an extra calculation opportunity, giving you more opportunities to continue the game. Note that the game will end immediately when your computer runs out.

desc:
Would you like to play Squid Game? Camera Dodge 3D is an exciting hide-and-seek game. Can you avoid the capture by the camera and reach the finish line in the shortest time? 3! 2! 1! Hide! Come and compete with other players around the world to see if you can become the champion of the game!

What are the features of the game?

The game adopts a 3D perspective. In this exciting race game, you need to run across cover-filled platforms while avoiding camera snaps. And pass the finish line first. It challenges your reflexes and hand-eye coordination. The game provides players with a unique gaming experience through its exciting gameplay. The camera in the game will take snapshots at any time, bringing players a tense and exciting atmosphere. In a fast-paced game, you will need to react in the shortest possible time to avoid failing the challenge. This tension will bring you unprecedented gaming fun and satisfaction.

Easy and fun gameplay.

In the game, you only need to use the mouse or slide the screen to control the character to move left and right. While running, you need to pay attention, when the countdown appears on the mobile phone screen at the end, please hide in time. There are food, fruit, and various car-shaped bunkers on the platform for you to hide. Different scene designs increase the diversity of the game, allowing you to enjoy more fun and challenges in the game.

Play now and enjoy a fun, and addicting online competitive game.

As the game progresses, you will face different level goals, such as collecting specific types of candies, reaching a certain score, and more. You need to plan every step appropriately and use special props and combined skills to complete the mission.

name: Girls Nail Salon
tags: Android, Coloring, Exclusive, Fun, Girl, HTML5, Kids, Online, Paint, Simulation
control: Mouse click or tap to play
shortDesc: Welcome to Girls Nail Salon, the ultimate virtual nail spa where you can unleash your creativity and become a master nail artist.
desc: In Girls Nail Salon, you'll have access to a wide range of nail polishes, patterns, decals, and accessories. Choose from a variety of colors and styles to create unique and trendy nail designs. From classic French manicures to bold and vibrant patterns, the possibilities are endless! Start by preparing your client's nails, trimming and shaping them to perfection. Then, apply a base coat and let your imagination run wild as you experiment with different colors and designs. Add glitter, gems, and stickers for that extra touch of sparkle. Don't forget to finish off with a top coat to make the design last longer and give it a glossy finish.

name: Base Defense
tags: 3D, Action, Adventure, Android, Boy, Collect, Exclusive, HTML5, Kids, Obstacle, Online, Shooting, Simulation, Skill, Strategy
control: Mouse click or tap to play
shortDesc: Base Defense is an exciting tower defense game that takes you into a world of combat and strategy.
desc: In Base Defense, you need to build and upgrade various defensive towers to effectively resist the influx of enemies. Destroy an enemy and you will get the corresponding number of gold coins. You need to choose and lay out a tower defense strategy based on the enemy's characteristics and weaknesses. At the same time, you can also use a variety of powerful skills and props to enhance your defense and fight against more powerful enemies.  you will face multiple levels and challenges, each with a different map and enemy layout. You need to flexibly use your strategic thinking and reaction capabilities to rationally arrange resources and tower defense layout to ensure the safety of your base and defeat all enemies.

shortDesc: Draw Car 3D is a thrilling and addictive online game where you can unleash your creativity and design your own unique cars.
desc: In Draw Car 3D, you are the master car designer. Your objective is to draw a car using the provided sketch pad and then test its performance on various challenging tracks. The more creative and efficient your car design is, the better your chances of winning races and unlocking new levels.

shortDesc: Grab Pack Banban is a simple aiming game where you need to help the protagonist Banban grab as many goodies as possible.
desc: In the game, you will manipulate a cute little character, you only need to tap the screen with your fingertips to control the movement of Banban's hand. At the same time, the game uses cute cartoon pictures and cheerful background music to provide you with a pleasant gaming experience.

shortDesc: They Are Coming 3D  is an intense and thrilling online game that will keep you on the edge of your seat and you can play the game for free!
desc: They Are Coming 3D is an immersive and action-packed game. Prepare yourself for action as you strategically plan your defense and strategically position yourself to take down each wave of attackers. The game offers multiple levels of increasing difficulty, each presenting new challenges.

tags: Action, Adventure, Android, Boy, Exclusive, HTML5, Online, Simulation, Strategy

shortDesc: Stick War Legacy is a thrilling strategy game set in a world dominated by stick figures that you can play for free.
desc: In Stick War Legacy, you'll need to train and command your stick figure units, including miners, swordsmen, archers, and more. Strategically deploy your forces and make use of their unique abilities to defeat your enemies. Build an army, gather resources, and upgrade your units to become an unstoppable force.

shortDesc: Save The Sheep is an immersive game that puts you in the role of a shepherd that you can play for free.
desc: Save The Sheep is an engaging and addictive online game. In this game,  your mission is to protect the adorable sheep from danger. The gameplay involves using strategic thinking and stake fencing around the sheep to guide the sheep to safety. Challenge yourself to complete all the levels, each more challenging than the last. Can you save all the sheep?

name: Word Search
tags: Android, Boy, Drawing, Educational, Exclusive, HTML5, Kids, Online, Word
control: Mouse click or tap to play
shortDesc: Word-Search is a brain challenge and hidden word-finding game, this game will help you expand your vocabulary and improve your focus.
desc: Word-Search is an engaging puzzle game that will put your word-finding skills to the test. In this game, you are presented with a square grid filled with mixed letters. Your goal is to find hidden words within the grid by swiping your mouse over them. In addition, the game has multiple themes to choose from, including animals, food, cities, etc., to ensure that you can have new experiences and challenges in every game.
